AdjResult.description: Results derived from adjusted or supplementary analyses.

AdjStatePerStudy.description: State information for the study that includes adjustments or specifics not captured in the standard protocol or result folders.

ResultState.description: This folder could contain information or metadata summarizing the results of the study as a whole, including final states of the imaging parameters and outputs.

ScanProgram.scanProgram.description: This file likely contains scripting or programming information used to control the scan sequences during the imaging session.

study.MR.description: This file or folder typically contains metadata or comprehensive details about the MRI study itself.

subject.description: This file holds information specific to the subject or sample imaged during the study.

acqp.description: This file contains acquisition parameters for the scan.

configscan.description: This file contains configuration information for the scan.

method.description: This file contains the method or protocol used for the scan.

dicom.description: This folder contains the DICOM files for the scan.
